section.name: NotifyGru Module
section.subsection: Notify Gru The module is a workflow task which, from a resource to build a stream associated JSON and send it to a processing entity

subsection.name: Provider of resource
subsection.p:
Notify Gru is a generic task to the extent that it can work with any resource provider (ticketing, appointment, directory ...).
Thus for each service (ticketing, appointment, directory ...) a provider will be implemented to provide maximum information about the resource.
There are two types of resource provider :

ul.li:
The resource providers :
A resource provider is the link between the NotifyGru task and a single form is a plugin service. This is the case of ticketing plugin consists of a single resource form.

The resource providers managers:
A resource provider manager is the link between the notifygru task and each plugin service form concerned. This is the case of the plugin Gesion of Appointment, directory where one can have more service forms

subsection.name: Configuring the task

p.strong: NotifyGru configuration is done in two steps:

subsection.strong: A first page with two immutable fields:

ul.li: A list to choose the supplier of resource among different implementations of the available suppliers
The checkbox field will enhance the flow field demand_status V1 notification. The value is 0 (meaning "current" unchecked) or 1 (meaning "closed". One is if the checkbox is checked).

subsection.name: Using the task
subsection.p: When the service receives a request, the task is launched (Automatic or manual start) and the Supplier during the configuration responsible for collecting all the information needed to build the JSON stream sent to the external entity
